info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:31PM EDT until April 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR EDGEFIELD COUNTY... At 531 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Edgefield to near Evans, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Edgefield, Johnston, Edgefield County Airport, Trenton, Lick Fork Campground, Strom Thurmond High School, Stevens Creek Public Park, Harmony, Poverty Hill, Murphys Estates, Pleasant Lane, Ninety Nine Islands, Mt Vintage, Northside Fire Station Main, Cleora, Colliers, Forks Campground, Edgefield Federal Correction Institution and Murphy Village. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina near mile marker 0. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
